Put movies with advertisement.nothing like before, Netflix is not doing this. way better.that is why I see Amazon prime videos less than netflix...Now I receive a pop-up offering for $2+montly remove the advertisement in some movies... in my language it's call AVARICIA. You have millions and want more ...not hard feeling and not intension to ofend. Guys is not enough if I pay annual Amazon prime and buy a lot of things from your website?

Good except for the promos. You should be able to disable promos. They're not constant, but I have slow internet so when I do get one before I start watching something it takes a long time, because I have to wait til it loads before I can skip it. I pay, I shouldn't have to watch ads (yes, promos are a type of ad, I will not be unconvinced).

A good selection of movies but unfortunately often missing the English audio. It means we lose a lot of content. I also don't like the adverts, for other shows I have to pay for. Why am I seeing adds when I pay for a service. As it is, we are inundated with adds every time we use the internet, I watch movies to relax. Please take those adds away, I'm quite capable of signing up to another streaming service or finding a movie without adverts\"your help"

I loved prime when it came out as I could access more shows that I enjoy. Would have given 4 or 5 stars then. However, I don't see why I should continue to pay a subscription to a service that has decided to charge extra in app for specific tv shows and movies. This should be included in the initial service charges not as additional payments. It's stupid and soon will loose customers to other apps as your tv shows can be viewed on other platforms with no additional cost.

the new mode where you watch series with adverts even though you already paid for prime is going to make me cancel the subscription. this is ridiculous. I pay for the faster delivery and the adverts in the beginning of episodes was fine. but it's an ad every five minutes for at least 60+ seconds???? might as well not pay for it anymore and watch normal TV at this rate. I got Prime because I DIDN'T want to watch adds all the time, now I'm being forced to watch them on a series that was primeincl.

inconsistent on loading. constant green flashes. its a budget app like most everything amazon so not a real surprise. amazon and quality arent really synonymous. And now I'm dropping a star for the new default layout with x-ray. Whoever is in charge of the app design just sucks. and now as of the new year, theyve made it worse again with apparently a low limit for downloads (cant even get a full season) and all their ads. Skip it and go back to cable

Terrible UI. After selecting the content to watch, the subtitles are off and each time I would like to switch off/on the subtitles, it takes me back to trivia and cast details. Everytime clicking on the screen rotate to come back to watch the content is just useless. The old UI was much better. Kindly improve the new one or restore it the way it was before. PS: The subtitles are way off with whatever content I watch for the majority of the videos

Horrible application. If you move to a different country for whatever reason and do not speak the native language, then amazon screw you over. I live in Germany, and they offer most of their things in only German audio or subtitles, even for English movies or shows. Why would you offer only dubbed versions and not the original, and with no English subtitles. It's mind-boggling how stupid of an issue this is, and they have had it for years. Better to go to Netflix or Disney plus

It's streaming that is included with you Prime subscription. Baby Head Bezos isn't making enough billions, so now you have to pay an additional $2.99 a month to not have adds. So now that $174.88 to have Prime be what it once was. Well almost you also have to have Amazon Music Unlimited which would be $294.76 a year. Not really worth it, considering it used to be a $100 a year.

Several things wrong with this app. 1. Every popular movie is tied up in some subscription now-a-days. What's the point of prime subscription if everything needs an add on? 2. Many features which make streaming a convenience are missing. Picture in picture isn't available, There's always some ad before a video. It's a game,how can we make the user experience worse?

For people not speaking the offical language in their country. Well you wont be able to change languages. Not even to english. So ye might as well use Netflix Disney or Youtube. All are better alternativ in terms of functionality, usability and user experience. I also noticed a clear difference in streaming quality. Primes algorithm to compensate low data flow seems to be the worst out of the bunch.

At first, the content was ok, but the constant, relentless moving around of stuff is beyond stupid... you finally find the shows you want, and have 3 days to watch em before they go to a separate channel you gotta pay extra for... only to pay for it and find out they never have the sequels, or part 3, but no part 2, etc. Just a trainwreck of rights management. The only reason it gets 2 stars is because the xray feature is actually quite intelligent... if it works. One star now that there's ads

You pay for a subscription to a streaming service without ads, but now have to pay extra per month to watch without ads. All streaming services have gotten more expensive, but to watch without ads should be a minimum. There's already limited content that's available on prime video, but to have to watch ads or pay an extra 3 per month for something you were already paying for seems ridiculous. Stopped using netflix for their changes, looks like prime will be next.

Would have been 5 stars for shows and movies other streaming services don't have but after the incorporation of ads and unskipable show promos it makes the app annoying. I don't understand why a successful company needs a mere 3 dollars more from all of there users when they all are already paying their price with prime on the shopping app. This should have stayed ad free for free. Hope Bezo decides to fix his mistake.

Since the first day I've subscribed to Amazon Prime, I'm in love with this app. So many varieties of shows and movies in this endless entertainment. Love it. I'm changing my review from above to bad and deceiving app service. They started to show ads now and ask for more money every month. I will unsubscribe soon.

If you think I'm going to pay extra for ad-free, then you had better get ready for a rude awakening. Any more of these price hikes or other heinous changes, and I'll cancel my prime subscription. There are other ways to watch movies for free with that ads, and I'll gladly choose those over this capitalist b*******.

The sudden change to now having ads is stupid, I started prime so I didn't have to do that. Now they want a $2 upcharge, this is just cable but you get to spend MORE money because half the shows are on different apps that you need a subscription for. It's disappointing but not unexpected.

Only plays online. You have to he in airplane mode to play the music of you don't have service or underground. Typically when you download songs, they can play without connection, but this app, you still need internet to listen to music which doenst make sense to waste storage to download music that still won't play. I really miss Napster.

In and of itself not a bad app, but I find it unacceptable that after 2 updates they still haven't managed to put a slider on the side to scroll up and down on the PC app. AND you have to scroll through more and more pay to view stuff that one can't even get outside the US, so a total, irritating waste of time. Shame on you, Amazon, you should do better

An ok app and would get much higher rating if they didn't constantly bombard you with items you can't watch unless you pay extra! Not as good as BBC iPlayer or Disney plus tbh. Amazon gives a lot for what you pay IF YOU USE IT ALL. If not then it works out quite expensive. You get lots of adverts and extras you need to pay for, so need to keep an eye on it!

Generally, the experience is good. But new movies and TV serials have not been coming in frequently, of late. And I cannot understand why so many items are displayed if their videos are " not available ". If a video is not available and is not coming on in the next month, the item should not be displayed. Its quite irritating clicking so many items only to see that they cannot be viewed. In addition, the latest changes to apparantly upgrade the experience is, in my opinion, not an advancement.

I love the prime video exclusives, I love the PlayStation UI and I love the fire TV stick ui, my only problem with it is, that they got the UI on the mobile app so wrong,it looks so ugly and displays the wrong info at wrong spots, they even made it hard to switch to full screen! I really don't have that much of an issue with one ad per episode you watch, but knowing that prime gives you so much besides video, it's fine really, the UI is just horrible, everything else is fine.

coming from Netflix and youtube, i find prime video to be seriously lacking in terms of user interface. there are no speed adjustments (i like binge watching at 1.25x or 1.5x speeds). when resuming a video, it requires too many taps to have it at full screen and start playing. also, no touch-lock feature that blocks accidental presses.

I have been a subscriber to Amazon Prime since it was under ten dollars a month (I believe it was $7.99 a month then). I found my way to PRIME because I was paying entirely too much on cable. I loved the fact that I could watch uninterrupted movies at home or on the go, without being forced to sit through stupid commercials I didn't want to see itfp. I am already paying to watch without commercials; that's why I came to PRIME itfp. Aren't you rich enough already, Bezos? I'm angry. Cancelled.

Never remembers what episode I'm on...either jumps to the last season or is on episode 1. Edit; just because I'm livng in a Spanish speaking country, does not mean I want all shows dubbed in spanish. I like to watch all shows/movies in original language with English subtitles if needed. Please sort and I put up my rating. Edit again. If you don't fix the language and subtitles I'm cancelling my subscription. How u going to dub a English movie to Spanish?

The menu is a mess and it's full of low budget movies. There hasn't been any quality new releases for as long as I can remember. The difference between prime and netflix is staggering. I've paid for the year but I won't be renewing again. I have deleted the amazon music app as it's beyond bad to the point it's barely fit for purpose.

Being that you own IMDb, could you add the ability to click on an actor's bio in the IMDb X-ray section and be directed to their page in the IMDb app/browser? THAT would be super sweet. Picture-n-picture works horribly while using navigation gestures and it would be great if the smaller p-n-p window had skip forward and back buttons. A button to go back to portrait from landscape would be nice. Why doesn't clicking on a TV show take you straight to the episodes list? Thc. Give your coders a hug!

Many glitches in the app, I am using Realme 8 phone, I see few glitches in the app. If I download one episode it shows I'm downloading two episodes. When I forward the videos the screen freezes, I need to go back and restart the video but if I hit forward it freezes again. I am Hotstar and Netflix as well on this device but both apps run smoothly except Prime. Also I don't see pause option to pause downloads. Plz work on it.

Save your money. More ads than any of us know what to do with. Not really sure what the prime benfit is anymore other than to just join the "price club" business model. They dont deliver products as they used to and now all the prime products require additional investment if you want to have the previous level of prime membership. You cant take your video purchases with you so dont bother buying anything. Find another way to engage content you enjoy, and find it ad free.

One of the best features of having an Amazon Prime Membership was access to Prime Video with no interruptions. Now, we have to pay an additional $2 for no ads ON TOP OF THE $14 we already pay for the Prime Membership.... I already had my issues with the Prime Membership, but this additional fee has pushed me to rid myself of all Amazon services.

I'm annoyed now. My screen keeps glitching everytime I watch Prime video. I was scared that it was my laptop's fault but this seems to happen only while watching Prime. I uninstalled and reinstalled it several times. Even opened it in Google chrome directly to watch, its the same everywhere. On top of that, there are no new good movies and shows. Everything I want to watch needs added subscription. I paid for prime membership and I'm not even able to use it. What to do??

I couldn't believe I'm writing this review, I've been a prime user for so long and haven't faced any issues until I switched to a new device, I've been facing problem ever since, the apps keeps glitching and closing and opening so often making me wanted to rage quit, I've been facing it alot to the point I couldn't enjoy any movies there, and here's one there is some subtitles glitching stating that "subtitles isn't available for the audio" idk what's happening to the prime video now. Pls fix it

Honestly, I would have given Prime Video 5-Stars, except for the newly instroduced extra cost to get rid of ads. I will likely not be watching nearly as much (if at all) if I have to watch ads now. I'm already paying enough for streaming services and just can't ad (pardon the pun) more expense.

No back button. Going back resets the home screen so you can't tell where you left off when browsing. Fast forward and rewind mechanisms are poor. Too many ads on the main home screen for movies subscriptions etc... Good variety and good quality streaming visually.

This app is a disgrace. If you search something ( like an actor name or a specific year) results are guaranteed to be irrelevant.No way to explore the full catalog. It has been a mess for years and the only update was bring the non free content spam. Even that is badly executed, while the SD option is in your face you need to search for the 4k option and open extra menus.The funny part is that most of the time SD and UHD are the same price). Richest man in the world and can't afford a UI expert.

Sometimes buttons aren't there, sometimes they are. Sometimes it starts on a different video than it was last closed on. I think most of my issues with the app stem from a laggy, inconsistent ISP. --------------edit to add---------------- When you guys keep upgrading good features away, you probably shouldn't harass me for a new review

It's not enough to pay for the subscription. Now they've added commercials, and unless you're willing to pay them more money they're going to ruin the experience of you using their service (one that you already pay for!) with constant ads. This is money grubbing at its finest. HUGELY disappointed that they've gone backwards in quality of user experience so they can nickle and dime people to death.

Perfect for on the go movies, even makes movie night a breeze. The holiday season, and summers have always been hectic with family trips, now having the entire families favorite movies at the touch of a button, plus all our subscriptions in one place really pulls the hassle out. So even when everything else goes sideways, we know prime will be on track.

Does the job for the most part but sorely needs some way to format film and series selections for easy-viewing; allowing a more varied list of categories/genres so the lookup process gets cut down. Too many gems you only get to stumble upon and not be purposefully laid out according to viewer preferences or even just based on a film/TV show genre.

So a trillion dollar company decided that Prime membership isn't good enough any more. The ad-free promise that we pay for now includes ads, and we have to pay even more to get it ad-free again. And when they decide their new "premium _ rates aren't good enough, they'll raise them again, and include ads at the rate they're requiring now, and so on, and so on, and so on... Screw you, Bezos. You're not getting any more from me. Prime subscription cancelled.

It would better if we didn't have to pay all this extra money for channels now just to watch what you like. I'm thinking about switching back to Netflix or Hulu because this is just becoming ridiculous!! Please stop adding more channels and please stop charging so much per channel it's crazy. So people are on a fixed income and can't afford all these extra costs. Please make it more affordable so everyone can enjoy it!!!

The app is a lot better than its ever been. But the lack of content available for free with my membership is a bit meh/mediocre. I've found some great niche finds but rn prime isn't worth paying more for. I definitely will NOT be paying to have ads removed! Paying more for a service that offers far less than its competitors is hilarious. I refuse to support Amazon's ladder acrobatics! You don't offer enough but wanna charge for what u DON'T yet have? Bundle ur price and quit acting desperate!

Just started watching a film on Prime and then, after about five minutes, there's adverts. I don't pay for adverts and I've just seen they're now charging more for ad free viewing. Prime doesn't have great programmes as it is and this money grab, from one of the richest people in the world, means I'll be cancelling my subscription.

The videos are great. I would have given 5 stars, but Amazon started charging more for ad-free streaming on a product we already paid for. I could understand the fee if Amazon Prime was free, but it's over $100 per year. Now, our Prime membership includes annoying ads. Capitalism wins again. How disappointing.

I can't tell you if there's good movies or shows bc the UI is one of the worst I've ever seen. The selection seems so small because they dont just let you browse titles. Theres no way to control the brightness when streaming. The video is lagging but only on my app bc my laptop works fine and every other streaming service is fine. I just really hate using the app. Nice content I guess

It's hard to navigate for me honestly. Not very streamlined, and I'm not paying for any subscriptions or streaming, so I'd like for there to be an easier way to find free shows or movies I can watch. Not worth paying for anything on this app at this point honestly. Netflix was far superior

if you plan to watch a series of movies there will always be one you have to rent or buy. you can not rent, buy or subscribe to anything in the app, it redirects you to your emails or a webpage. basic features are missing from this bare bones, poorly organised, laggy app. if you want us to spend more money on other in app services, why can i not do it in app !!!

Already paying $14.99/mo for prime. 2 day shipping is no longer a thing and now we have to pay extra for video to be ad free. Keep blowing through money on Amazon Original shows that you won't renew. We get invested into the story for nothing. Man in the High Castle and Peripherals come to mind. Whoever is making the decisions can't have any common sense.

HDR videos are UNWATCHABLE! I know I'm not the only one as I've read hundreds of complaints from other android users where videos that stream in HDR are extremely dark, no matter how bright you adjust your device's settings. There's no toggle to switch HDR off, nor is there a brightness adjustor within the app, like in Netflix. This has been a problem for FOUR YEARS and Amazon have done absolutely NOTHING! Awful awful awful customer service. Netflix's interface puts Amazon to shame.

I really hate it when it randomly plays a trailer of another show/movie everytime i play a show/movie of my choice. It even automatically plays another trailer everytime i finished watching an episode. And there's no way to stop it from randomly playing a trailer! I hate it! Let me find what i want to watch. When i click on a show of my choice, it should only play what i clicked to watch. Not some random trailer when i have to keep clicking skip!!

Very hard to find content that's "free to me" or included with prime. Presumably this is deliberate. Updated again: to reflect the addition of advertisements for paid subscriptions in top of the previous price hike. Worse most content is paid but if I'm going to pay for digital video why on earth would I buy it somewhere so shoddy and increasingly ensh***ified. You're much better off buying from Apple TV or Google TV.

Good, but there needs to be an option to check shows and movies as "watched", would make it a lot easier, also would improve recommendations. Until this day, this still hasn't been solved. For ex. When searching for "drama tv", I can't filter out my watched series. Also, would love to see an option where I could bundle all the seasons of a series, so I could better search for new series.

I've faced errors since sign in showing internal problem error, i checked my connection by streaming on another platform and it's completely fine. I have to repeatedly filling the sign in till i finally succeed. Then i immediately faced by another problem, my internet data comes with free prime vid subscription and it's error again when i claimed it. I tried to search where I can reclaim the package and i found nothing. I got free subs for wetv too and i can smoothly claim it, it's your problem

Good, but a bit buggy. No issue in general. Contents are getting better so I am using less netflix, disney and other. But when I click some other apps, it can go into ghost mode where you can hear, but you cant see. You have to kill it to stop. Nothing too big of an issue that everyone encounters but not perfect to give 5 starts

App is does not work properly. If I wanted to forward or backward even 10sec, the video gets stuck with the audio working and I have to watch from wherever the video picked up from. It's frustrating. Regret getting a year long prime subscription, could have chosen other streaming platform than prime.

It was good before they added in ads to their shows and then ransomed the content with a $2.99 scheme to remove the ads. I wish I could move my massive library of movies that I bought there because I no longer trust the company. Another reason that I'm going back to physical media.

Slowly improving. Reasonable movies. Sometimes they don't have enough resources to playback, but that happens only once or twice for some movies. Can jump 10sec forward or back but that's too small. Please Amazon, make it 30sec. Can't find a please to make that feedback, they don't want to know.

Did not like the latest update. The change in default behaviour of full screen mode to small screen with the cast information is not good. Please revert the changes. Please bring back the default full screen play mode. Even the trivia, cast info all were getting overlaid that was better than the now behaviour of going to small screen play. Revert the changes and bring back old behavior.

Used to love this app, now it is practically useless (actually a complete POS). Over half of the movies and shows are not actually available for viewing without paying an additional fee. Your app is now frustrating and constantly has me wondering why I even bother with a prime subscription . I suspect you no longer understand your customer base, and have lost sight of what made you successful in the first place!

1. There are ads. 2. The browser version doesn't sync the subtitles with the audio. 3. Subtitles aren't available for the text shown on screen for some shows. 4. In the TV app the loading animation doesnt go away even after the video has started playing.

Everytime I play something, it starts in portrait mode (wth was going through your heads man?), X-ray takes me out of the immersion, it is a very good feature but it CAN'T BE TURNED OFF. Also living in LATAM I can tell you people really don't care about your clients: my family always asks me why there's no spanish dub and only spanish subs. And lastly but probably the most annoying: the "previews" of other series/movies on Prime Video: they're just ads inside an app I'm already paying for.

I uses to love prime, it was almost a year before I realized that I could watch movies for free!!! Not all, but some and that was pretty cool. I like the app a lot and how I can download my purchased content to take with me. The only downside is that I feel the app is not equipped to loading large storage caches. My guess is it's in the encryption/unencryption process.

Paying more for something we are already paying for (ads free). Shame! On top of it, you can't "continue watching" a movie because it disappears from the list! You have to search for it again. And guess what, the movie doesn't even start where you paused it! It starts all over again!

there is a good selection of movies BUT it is very hard to find them with no search function. Also there is no way of telling which items are a series and which are feature movies. There are also no indications of the length of the items untill you actually click on them and open them.

Amazon Prime offers a robust package of benefits, from fast shipping to a vast content library. However, the app's interface feels cluttered, especially with additional subscriptions. Simplifying navigation and providing clearer explanations for extra services would greatly enhance the user experience. Despite these drawbacks, the core features are reliable, making it a worthwhile membership.

So I want to give more stars but there's a few things that just won't let me, 1 has a hard time keeping track of what episode you left off on, 2 the organization media is sloppy at best and could use a major overhaul, 3 next and some other features aren't very convenient where they are placed and how you get to them, 4 search and category could use some better sorting and finer search parameter around keywords

Enough is enough.

Ads, seriously? I pray every month for prime and use it maybe once a week, and you want more money for me to watch ads free? Another problem I have, it sometimes only gives me German audio on old movies (2015 for example) that were natively made with English (USA), because I live in Germany. Kidding me? I want to watch US Movies in ENGLISH and not German.

Once your prime account is open and running it is fine but trying to renew your subscription is like fu,#ing pulling teeth as my credit card ran out and took a week resend a new one by then my credit card had defaulted on prime and I couldn't start my prime acc everything with Amazon and Amazon prime app didn't matter what I tried could not start it i tried to ring them they were not very good on the phone they took it as a joke and made me tell them five times before not too bright those lot

This used to be great along with all other prime services which Amazon is actively ripping away. Free grocery services with prime - gone. Faster shipping with prime - gone unless you spend a certain amount. Prime video - free movies now they are mostly rent or buy and the free ones will have commercials unless you spend more. No thanks.

Some great shows but unfortunately the app has many paid shows and ads, reducing overall performance. There are many other minor issues (which I won't get into) that make the app less intuitive and the user experience seamless.

When I download a video and try to play it offline, it gets stuck at several places and gets skipped several minutes and the video ends abruptly. I have to reconnect to internet to view those. There is no use of downloading video to view it offline.

Adding a lock screen button while streaming will be awesome so we don't fast-forward by accident. A previos episode option will be great also. Having an option to enable and/or disable the cast info feature is a good idea. Overall I'm in love with it.

The webplayer's subtitles do not sync at all. Decided to try out the application on my phone, subtitles worked fine. So I decided to download the movie so that I can watch it later only to realise it downloaded the audio in Spanish while English is selected in audio settings. Infuriating.

Stupid Limitations! Mirror cast to Roku works great. Mirror cast to Fire TV stick - the app and Fire TV stick must be logged into the same Amazon account. Then casting is unnecessary, and therefore pointless. My wife has a separate Fire TV stick since she has her own account logins for YouTube, Spotify, PBS, Tubi, Freevee, etc. Amazon's separate account profiles on the Fire TV stick doesn't accommodate these so that "feature" is a joke. So I use my Roku on that TV for Prime videos
I like the app, layout is good and functions mostly well. However, it doesn't track my progress in tv shows very well. I very often have to figure out which episode I was on and where in the episode.

The old UI was much better, x-ray view is useless n FF 10 sec is not at all smooth after 3/4 continous clicks on most of the contents, it's useless now, It has become like new content provider's app not the real Amazon Prime app. Jus compare with other OTT apps before release of the app.
Poorly designed! The rewind or fast forward is only in 10 seconds intervals. Does not make any sense. VHS technology was better than this! Also, not good category search. Netflix is a much better App

Difficult to find what I'm looking for. Although I have a separate subscription to Crunchy Roll it does not let me carry that over and would need a second subscription just for the app. If I wanted to watch movies and shows with ads I would just stick to regular TV.

Adding ads and forceing me to pay twice is not cool . Especially when you offer the most limited option and in limited language. It used to be one genuine reason to stay in prime subscription (despite it's not that worthy ) now adding this restriction is just you saying :" stop wasting your money on our subscription, we fail to give good service and we just wants your money )

Used to be the best when it didn't have ads throughout the episodes of shows, and movies, ever since it's gotten kind of annoying. Overall still my favorite streaming platform, but could do with less ads.

The fact that randomly when I use bluetooth at the same time as watching something and mirroring to a tv the screen will go black ruins the entire experience for me because its obviously a bug with the app doesn't do it all the time and sometimes its completely random because i can watch something I've already watched before and it was fine but now this time it's a problem... already tried deleting app and re installing.... for a billion dollar company this should not be happening ....

I like all the different movies, I did Netflix for 9 years but they stopped playing the movies I liked and went up on their price. They certainly never had Thursday Night Football nor TV shows you can watch plus music. It's a great package for the money. Definitely 5 STARS.

The most user unfriendly of all the streamers. They care more about trying to trick you into buying things then making this a user friendly app. The content is mediocre at best and the app is a cluttered mess. Nobody in the family watches. The others are better. We probably won't renew prime next time. And now with ads. The worst just got even worse

I'm still learning the are some things about it that are frustrating. But there are many things that are enjoyable. Somebody needs to fix the problem, If a movie is unavailable. It needs to have a big yellow banner across it. Don't let me click on it and then find out. It's unavailable!!!

HORRIBLE EPISODE MANAGEMENT! I was attempting to watch the great food truck race, and whoever is in charge of episode management needs to be fired. They have this dumb documentary thing MIXED IN with the other episodes. These need to be separate. You have to keep a log of what episodes you've seen just to stay on track. Some of the worst organization I've ever seen. It almost makes me want to cancel my membership just because of this. Do better.
The value at which the service is offer is very great and budget friendly. But the app experience when changing video settings is worst in my opinion. It pauses and close the video every time.

Constantly has video lagging (frames skipping) issues. It's not my Internet connection. I don't have this problem on any other video app. I guess it's cool if you want to watch movies that look almost slow motion

The app either won't play the video I bought, or it glitches and goes back to the main menu or it just shuts down completely on me! It's been like this for 2 days and I've tried everything to fix it! I hope Amazon sees this cuz this is getting ridiculous!

Love the app. The home options aren't customizable at all, which I think all streaming apps could improve on, but otherwise just needs to give more attention to classics rather than independent films that are dubbed over other languages. Ooo and more anime

You have to exit playing to move to another app even for 5 secs. Google search links for specific movies not working Renting the movie option is very unfair.. You can watch it only once. Rentals should be available for a month atleast for multiple watch. Number of watch can be limited to 6. Despite paying only for the movie couldn't watch it twice :-(

A wealth of options with more channels than you can name. However, it is confusing to use when there is a channel for many of the classic television series that are also available by episode as individual events. All the quality sports are under lock  to satisfy agreements. No live sports television from networks. The fact that television is no longer free is a disturbing concept  Soon everyone who remember broadcast television will be dead; and to think, they use to have petitions warnings

Didn't really know why, but I can't get past the starting screen on the app. It keeps saying "service unreachable" and telling me to make reports. But for some reason, I can login and stream just fine via website. Please fix this. I already lost quite some subsribed time because of this.

Not happy... I have been watching Prime video for years now and until today have been relatively happy with it, until today. I just received an email from Amazon Prime informing me that effective January 2024 all content (movies and TV shows) will now include ads! Seriously? As if the annual Prime fee I pay isn't enough, now I am informed that I can opt to continue streaming without ads if I just pay an additional $2.99 per month; Amazon, your greed is getting out of control! Shame on you!!

I really like this app, I can watch at least every movie I've purchased . I bought the first 5 seasons of One Tree Hill and now I can't watch the first episode of all of those seasons because some stupid deal that Amazon Prime has with Max. Let Max do their own thing and you yours, Prime! I want the auto landscape mode back. Now it just feels like IMDb, watching a trailer in portrait mode. Please & thank you!

Solid app for streaming and downloading. I give it 4 stars because it has a tendency to randomly break a download. I also don't like when I go to rewatch an episode and it will start at the end and immediately jump to the following episode.

Skipping ads that are played at the beginning of video is impossible on Toshiba Android TV. When you skip, it just starts the same ad from the beginning, so you are forced to watch the whole ad. This was not an issue before. TV model: Toshiba 43L2163DB

There's a few titles that are mixed up. Total Recall shows and says it's the original, but is actually the remake. Mad Max 2 shows as Mad Max 2, but is actually Mad Max 1. I have not tried any other titles yet, but this problem may extend further. I will change this review to 5s once this issue is fixed.

If you're watching a series, if you are on season 5 for example, when you go to resume it will only resume the 1st season otherwise you have to manually go to season 5 and click resume instead of picking up from the season you left at. Also, shows and movies always start in small screen instead of big screen which is infuriating

Last month I couldn't use the app because the content was "not available on my area". This month everything is in French and I can't change the language. If that hasn't changed tomorrow I'll just cancel. This troubleshooting is taking too much of my time. La

The app works great on my phone; I've never had any crashes. It would be nice if there were more free movies and shows included with Prime. I do enjoy most of the ones I've seen so far. I also appreciate that the ads are minimal compared to the other streaming services I've used.

Very clumsy interface compared to Netflix. Once the monthly price is raised by $3 later this month for no ads I'll discontinue our subscription, uninstall the app from all devices, and rerate to 1 star. Not paying it and not watching commercials.

Prime app is not working in my MI TV after recent update. In most of the occasions, even though network is super good, app in TV is displaying message that problem with connecting internet. Not sure if anyone else also facing similar issue. I had to clear cache everytime and logging in again.

Forcing me to sift through freevee garbage is unbearable. If prime video was a standalone streaming service with out Amazon shopping I would have cancelled it. This is terrible and makes it not even worth scrolling through to find a movie or show. You guys ruined a great thing and I hope you make changes.

So it's an additional 2.99 to have an ad free experience for ads they put in, everything is behind a pay wall,i'm fed up! Amazon Originals leave like the Mr.Robot and Badlands Series,they remove Seasons for members from numerous tv shows of interest, Amazon has a glitchy and laggy Music app which is just frustrating to put up with,next they'll be saying ad logos has to be present while watching Prime Video and to remove them simply pay an additional 19.99 a month...it's been interesting bye

Probably the worst streaming app I've used. Things often don't work the way they're intended, the UI is counter-intuitive, the autoplay features are terrible. You'd think for an infinity-billion dollar company, they'd have something functional.

The app is buggy. It doesn't go to full screen as soon as we play something anymore. The xray feature sometimes displays information about completely different show. Still if fullscreen issue is fixed it will be 5/5. Atleast give us the option to do it.

Pretty good. Glitches once in a while, otherwise, much slower load than Netflix app. I really wish it had a bi-directional speed up / slow down button. "Resume watching videos across devices" works poorly. Otherwise fine.

Out of all the streaming video services. Prime has to be the worst streaming service, and now they are raising the price if you want ad free. Also, there are way to many bad production, foreign language and dubbed films. Amazon as a whole is going downhill. Hell, it's not even the best place for online shopping.

This is app is trash. It never keeps up with where you are when coming back into a show, it's very difficult to skip recaps and intros, and stream quality randomly comes in terribly at times. Yall need to ask Netflix for some pointers

It was a great application but their recent decisions are more than questionable. They're making you pay for what used to be free movies. And on Feb. 5 they're putting ads in the few free ones they still provide. Unless you pay extra which is just a shame and more than sad. It just shows their neverending greed.

I do hate it when you live it a different country. sometimes, it will say something this season in Currently not available for you. When all the rest of the seasons are and you just want to watch that one to know what is going on before you move onto the next season, but other than they do have a good Is selections of movies and series.

They throw foreign movies in here non stop. The amount of shows and movies in other languages is aggravating. Reading subtitles is reserved for epic all time movies, not just casual viewing. The quality of content in this app is weak, not to mention the kids/family section. You're either a baby or your 16. Where's the shows for kids 10 to 13? All in all, it's a good thing this app is free with prime - cuz I would NEVER pay for it.

They seem to actively making this app worse. There isn't even a back button from the video screen. Not to mention it now just randomly launches a video when you click into a show. Stop making updates. They only make the app worse.

Been watching the same 4 seasons of Hot in Cleveland for a very long time. Would love to have and option to be able to watch the fifth and sixth seasons. ALSO a really awesome Tv show suggestion; Reba, too expensive to purchase per episode on YouTube, I think the tv series- Reba would be a great addition to your library:)

No option to switch video in to landscape/full-screen mode inside the Prime App. and No I don't want to rotate my whole phone display just to watch videos while using Amazon Prime ... really UI of prime is lower than it Should be. definitely not user friendly.

It's OK. Show and movies are good, but it's missing random episodes of shows for some reason so you can't even finish them. With crunchy roll it's the worst, randomly you can't pick a language you want and it'll go from episode 100 to 140.

Some of the shows and movies are available only in one language, and often not the original in which the work was filmed. Even if you know the original language you might have only some awful dubbed version available. Robert de Niro speaking German with Mnchengladbach accent?? No thanks...

It's unbelievably expensive, yet I still have to watch more Commercials than cable. You rewind a minute, it will make you watch commercials it will playboy 5 seconds then you'll watch that same commercials again. Alsonit take forever to load anything, and it's horrible to use

Worst ott platform. They show you many movies but half of them are on rent, half of remaining are with add on subscription, many good movies showing not available in your country message. Why dont you just show movie title which you have to available on prime only. Because there is not much movies to see, simple.

Good shows but not so good app. Sometimes resumes on episodes you have already watched. Not all shows have English captions. If you change to other apps this app will return to main menu instead of just pausing. And Ads, ads even if you pay for service.

Adding adds is stupid and greedy! As much money that this company makes and you have to put adds into our streaming. You say it's to "keep making "quality" programs. " your original shows have not impressed me at all. Your shows based off of literature have been an insult to fans of those books. When worse is that the AI used to place adds is always horrible on placement, sometimes it's Emden in the middle of a sentence. Never are they placed where comercial breaks are built into older shows.

All Black...every movie(s) or TV show(s) is not showing video. You can hear the sound but no picture. I need this fixed ASAP! Plz and ty. Update: I'm taking away stars until I can watch a movie and it will show. Fix it fix it!!!!!

The product frontend has become very clumsy, it is really difficult to engage with the view that we have on the screen. Content is really good else it is all over the place. Please take time out to place the cards properly.

Amazon has taught me a lesson that I'll never do again! I anxiously purchased The Equalizer 3 video when I saw that it was available, and around a week later I looked on Netflix and saw that it would be available that next Monday, so I curiously waited on Monday to see what the price would be as I paid $20 to prime video for that same movie. And when Monday arrived I looked on Netflix and clicked on The Equalizer 3 video to see that it was playing for free.. Wow did I feel Used $20 WASTED!!!!!

Prime content is quite good and browsing has got a lot better. Resuming episodes and series is painful, and usually has no idea which episode was last watched. Also, I never want to rewatch the episode I just finished. Also, you guys own Lord of the Rings. Why not put the extended versions on there?

New update is worst.... 1. the auto play mode is disabled now, everytime i finish one episode, the next video does not play automatically...this is very bad 2.There is no brightness adjustment settings available at the Time of watching movies or web series 3. There are so many shows out there in this app, for which I have to pay again ...whyyyy? I am already a prime member...if those movies we cant see under prime membership then why you have kept all those movies in your platform?

After the recent update the video is lagging when forwarded.... doesn't synk with the audio. Also, the cast info that was available previously based on charaters on the screen is changed....previous one was better. Perhaps some updates are not required !

This is my current review the app is behaving pathetic.. 4k videos are not available, while downloading the video quality is maximum to 1 Gb only , first I used to get high resolution movies in 4k and download size is 4.5 gb , but after the update they have changes alot in video quality. Also there are not much collections of movies. UI is pathetic too. This is my last month of subscription I will not reniew my subscription. Whish I could give 0 star

Apps has too many bugs. Also there is no way you can watch a downloaded movies or series without the video either freezing or skipping some part of the video and start playing from some where else. This exp is what they make us pay 1499 per year for.

The worst streaming app out of them all. You can't find anything as it's all over the place trying to get you to subscribe to another streamer that they make money off rather than organising content properly and when you do look at something and then go back it's showing different content? It's so frustrating

Ever since the update I got this morning amazon video just buffers it hardly loads and my Internet is fast so I know that ain't the problem it just gives you a link you tap on it and it does nothing. Netflix and YouTube everything else works fine please get it together and fix your bandwidth I think it's requiring to much.

It's great, with the exception that there is no way for parents to control what SPECIFIC shows or movies aren't allowed. I wish Prime would allow us to remove specific content. My Autistic children love to watch Booba but it's super terrible le for their brain. It tends to make them a whole lot more hyper and disregulates their already sensible emotions. Plus it doesn't help with speech development. I had to erase the app off my electronic devices.

Charge to much, they now want additional monthly fee's. They are now running ad's starting February 2024 and extorting customers for an additional 2.99 per month if they want to be ad free. On top of all the other fees per channel and movie rentals. This is ridiculous. Greedy bozos making money on the advertising side and users of the platform.

The functionality sucks. For example, there is no side bar to scroll. You can only use the arrow keys. The icons are clunky and get stuck while scrolling up and down through videos or episodes of a show. When you try to go back up to see if you missed an episode to a show, you're taken all the way back to episode 1, no matter where you left off at. It happens every time.

Up until now I've been very happy with my prime video subscription, but for some reason I now can't connect to it on my phone, everything else works fine, disney etc. Very frustrating as I usually catch up on shows while on the bus.

What's the use of subscripting to Prime video's when many movies are missing & Rental movies are advertised aggressively by Amazon ? Honestly, I didn't like the content wonder what has happened to Amazon and Prime in the last 3 yrs they have seriously taken a dive towards the south. I used to place orders frequently earlier now I order them on Flipkart (availablity, better deals).

The most profitable company needs 2.99? In addition to paying for a Prime membership, starting in January, I will now have to pay an additional 2.99 a month to watch movies and shows without ads?! So disappointing, Amazon.. the greed .. this is ridiculous

Through my experience with this app I am continuously frustrated not being able to FF or Rewind a movie or show once it has begun. You must back out of your show and the options will then appear. Very frustrating!

TCL ROKU APP Needs modifications I love the app especially since you integrated prime video and freevee together. When you attempt to replay a video on roku after the episode has finished it is difficult to restart the episode. The process should simplified so replay or restart is allowed on every episode especially series as popular as "Reacher."

The only video streaming app I have that: - Buffers on my home WiFi network - Buffers when switching from portrait to landscape - Lacks a button to exit full screen without stopping playback - Doesn't open picture-in-picture mode when I switch to another app while playing

This app was included in the purchase of package from Telkomsel, but for some reason I was unable to collect for around 3 months now. I have consulted the local help center Grapari. Obviously they can't do anything. I have also tried uninstalling and then reinstalling to no avail. If you are not willing to provide free membership don't mention it in the package. If you are then please make sure the system is working properly! I am uninstalling this app.

It's the worst experience I've ever had. In the new release I have to press rotate button to watch the content in landscape mode. but when I click it, the app everytime crashes and I have to reboot my phone. p.s. I have a flagship phone with high specifications.

My account is logged in and I want to watch videos on my phone but wouldn't let me asking me to try the 30 day prime trial when I already have a prime subscription with that account. Keep trying to sign in tried reseting my password nothing would work. This app is lucky to get 2 stars out of me because I'm disappointed and don't know what's wrong.

The video is jittery and choppy. Will not play 4k on my Samsung S23 Ultra. I contacted support from Samsung, and we went through multiple steps. Uninstall, reinstall, clear cache, change to highest settings. Did all of that. It's clearly not the phone. It's the app.

The video streaming app is subpar; every movie comes with a charge. I believe Amazon should either shut down Prime Video or enhance it by adding more free content. Users already pay for Amazon Prime, yet additional subscriptions and rentals for services like Lionsgate Play and HBO are required.

I'm paying for a service that has 5 ads for each show. I stopped paying for television because of this, and other prime services don't work with being an android user, like your kindle. Explain to me the perks please of paying for something when the same ad plays every 7 mins? If things don't change you will be losing business. Would rather watch on Netflix.

Even though I had prime for a while I never thought of using it fully until I visited my sister. I realised there were great selections and things that I love to watch at my finger tips. It's also affordable and easy to use even my little ones can navigate on the app.

Would be better if you didn't have to rent or buy over half the shows. Outside of the "included with prime" (a subscription) you have to subscribe to other stuff to watch quite a few shows and movies. Anything for that all mighty dollar.

I would rate this app so much higher but knowing they have tens of millions of subscribers yet they're charging 13, 14, 15, 20, 35, dollars and up to buy movies that are 10 15 20+ years old, it's a ripoff! They're literally charging you say, on a 15 dollar movie (to buy) a convenience fee of 10+ dollars to download it and have it in your library. I just bought all 7 tremors movies on dvd for 14 dollars. To do that on Prime would've cost me 90 dollars, and that my friend is a joke! So 3 stars.

I love this it works so well, the settings are easy and the price is ofc cheaper then netflix, i removed a star because almost every movie i find and wanna watch is with money or just isnt even there. Otherwise from that, its the best app for movies and series. Love itttt<3

For the past week prime video is showing me only black screen with audio whenever I play any video.... I updated the app same issue.. I uninstalled and installed the app still the same issue What is this nonsense when I have my subscription fee in September for a whole year

Somehow creates an infinite loop when trying to cast videos to Chromecast, preventing me from accessing any other applications. It even disrupts the power menu showing up, I can barely restart my phone when this happens.

Poor app. Other video apps stream with little load times. This app takes forever to load and stream when comparing. It also doesn't restart the episode when re watching a series. This whole app could be better when other apps work better.

I love Amazon prime videos, they have great shows, movies and they don't have too many ads because I watch the freevee because I haven't paid for a subscription yet. I say yet, because I'm definitely going to get a subscription as soon as Christmas is over and I have more money to spend.

Functional but barely, Advertises videos being in UHD with HDR, but when the app launches you just get SD which on a bigscreen is almost unwatcheble. Tried in Chrome and Opera Browsers and it refuses to play the video, only plays in the Google playstore app, and the app doesnt have functional settings.

It's awful! We did a free trial recently and I just called to cancel it. We didn't even use it more than a week. There use to be an option to only show what was available to watch on prime but now they don't have that option anymore. You have to click on them to see if it's free or not and 90% or more of the movies and/or shows we found and wanted to watch could only be watched if we subscribed/ paid to another streaming company?. It was a very cruel experience for all of us!!

Overall, I enjoy the app. But when will it become fully compatible with the latest Android update? I keep getting error messages saying "the current version of prime is not compatible with the latest Android update"... very frustrating and makes my phone freeze.

userName: Our Damaged Society ODS Dark Art & Designs
content: Decent selections and cheapest membership. Just hate having to keep changing the picture mode from portrait to full screen each programme and sometimes it skips back episodes if you have to use another app while on pause

Very annoying language issues. Despite watching a show offered in OV english, the language switches to German automatically without a way to set it to the default sound. Even when the language is english, the show still plays dubbed in German.

DO NOT GET THIS APP OF YOU ARE GETTING IT TO WATCH THURSDAY NIGHT FOOTBALL! This the worst app anyone can use to try and watch Thursday night football. This app ain't worth ZERO stars. I purchased this app last year and this year to watch Thursday night football. It is impossible to watch the game because the screen freezes the whole. Y'all had a year to figure it out and some how it got worse. Even with WiFi it is impossible to watch. Y'all need to give this RESPONSIBILITY to another company.

Absolutely horrible, no content available and if it's available, most of the times you have to pay extra. Tons of bugs which are either intentional or overlooked by amazon, Obviously one has to go towards intentional since amazon has no shortage of developers or funds.

Love the app very easy to navigate the only thing I don't like is for some reason whenever I watch movies when i leave and come back for some reason it leaves a clear dark box on my screen and I have to restart my phone. Other than that it is a great app

Pretty good, I would like to see more NBA games, especially the Boston Celtics, and NFL, especially the Buffalo Bill's, without having to pay for the exclusive packages. Times are really tough, right now, financially, for most people. But the service is the most popular in our household. Keep up with the good work.

So far pretty useless. On a trial account to see if it's worth it. Keeps flicking me to USA and telling me stuff is not available in my location. Even after signing up, it won't let me go further without signing up. Unless something happens soon, I am going no further with Amazon Prime.

I'm enjoying it very much. I like that I can search by actor in addition to titles of shows. prime has most of my favorite actor's (Tobias Menzies) tv and movie titles. goodbye cable! prime shows are virtually ad free and the selection is vaste. the price is about a quarter of what I was paying for cable and MUCH MORE entertaining. all the show's are on demand so I can watch at my time and pace. I'm sorry I didn't buy prime earlier. thank you PRIME!

Basically good, but now prime wants to charge more money to get the shows ad free, even though they already charge an extra fee to be able to get it without ads, which I purchased. Not impressed with the money grab.

Best and high rated critical acclaimed English movies are available on this platform which is the best thing. One less star because most of them good movies are either rented or available to purchase which is annoying. Otherwise best streaming service platform than any other streaming platform like Netflix and hotstar

Keep having issues with video not being available even when connected to a known good Internet source. Selection is lacking a majority of the time. Some Originals are great but get cancelled for less interesting poorer quality shows.

I made a subscription through Amazon to Prime and canceled it several times and yet they are charging. Had to cancel my credit card just so they would stop! They can't find my subscription to cancel it but they sure find it to take payment. Not ever getting Amazon prime again!
Having an option to view the history of watched videos is required. Most of the movies are available ONLY for rent. Those that area included with the membership is hardly any, and of cheap quality.

Does not work great for all devices. I have a tablet that works horrible with this app, and that same tablet works great with another big video app. This app works great with an actual phone device. So they need to figure something out.
The app is pretty good, it's fun to have bios on the actors right at hand. But the play back, rewinding and fast-forwarding is kind of glitchy, not the easiest to navigate

Background music is more dominating than dialogue sounds. Dialogues are not audible. Night/dark scenes are not clearly visible. I have experienced this issue in almost all the videos that I have watched.

Plays very well on my tablet and tv, great range of content with very clear picture and I like the feature when you pause it gives a list of the actors on the screen, lots of new content and different sports on offer.
The UI is so hard to navigate. And it ruins the whole experience. However, the quality and features plus the amount of content available are good. Also, the TV UI is spot on.

The application doesn't work, after launching it just shows a black screen and nothing ever happens. I've tried force stop, delete data and restart, I've also tried reinstalling, the result is always the same. Shame on you!

omg I freaking love this app!!!! it lets me watch all my favourite shows and the download was so fast and so easy to log on with no disruptions or anything!! most definitely a recommendation for my friends, and since I watch on a computer, this is my favorite entertainment platform!

I rate 1 star for Amazon Prime Video because every content's video quality in Amazon Prime Video is in low quality like 480p. I suggest that Amazon Prime Video should include a choices of video quality selection every content like 720p or 1080p. I suggest also to include brightness adjustment and audio volume adjustment.

Absolute garbage entertainment experience. First, get rid of ALL ADS, we PAID for this service. Second, move all "RENT" and "BUY" content to a separate list we can access, not mixed with our INCLUDED content. Third, gift us the INTERNATIONAL experience we deserve whilst traveling, instead of blocking our content. Improve your search engine to be intuitive and inclusive, now that we have AI. In other words, become NETFLIX 2.0 instead of HBO 20 years ago. You have the means, we'll pay for it!

Prime video is, at its core, an excellent App and service except for the plan to force prime subscribers to endure endless uncontrollable ads throughout any content from February. I for one will jot be renewing my subscription in April. Well done Amazon.... Another once loyal sub lost!

Choppy playback. I'm a Trekkie, and like that all star trek shows are available, but when watching, after a few minutes, at most, the playback drops fps, which makes watching uncomfortable. Not sure what can be done about this.

Prime Video is constantly improving their library which is great. The only downside is that their video quality seems to be much darker than all other streaming services. Shows like Jack Ryan and Reacher are so dark you can barely see what is going on in a lot of scenes

You can build your own personal video collection on all your devices.
